name: Rebirth
description: A character trapped in darkness or evil is redeemed through love or sacrifice
examples: A Christmas Carol, Beauty and the Beast, Groundhog Day

initial_darkness.name: Initial Darkness
initial_darkness.description: The protagonist is trapped in a dark, selfish, or corrupted state

catalyst.name: Catalyst
catalyst.description: An event or person enters the protagonist's life as a force for change

resistance.name: Resistance
resistance.description: The protagonist initially resists change, clinging to old ways

growing_awareness.name: Growing Awareness
growing_awareness.description: The protagonist begins to see the need for change

crisis.name: Crisis
crisis.description: A crucial moment where the protagonist must choose transformation or remain trapped

transformation.name: Transformation
transformation.description: The protagonist chooses change and is spiritually reborn
